attributes.action: Restrict TV advertising to no more than 20 per cent of air time per channel
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Cable and satellite TV channels inundate viewers with unwanted adverts which occupy up to 35% of air time.  I'd like to see this restricted to 20% maximum; also the adverts percentage time published; and to stop channels synchronising commercial breaks.
